content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Publishing content\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" explains the publishing actions available to you in Contentstack.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"1: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://www.contentstack.com/docs/content-managers/working-with-entries/publish-an-entry/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Publishing an entry\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". Once you create an entry, you can publish it to one of the available publishing environments.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"2: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://www.contentstack.com/docs/content-managers/working-with-assets/publish-an-asset/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Publishing an asset\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". After uploading a new asset, you can publish it to any of the publishing environments added to your stack.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"3: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://www.contentstack.com/docs/content-managers/working-with-entries/unpublish-an-entry/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Unpublishing an entry\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". You can remove an entry from your web or mobile property by unpublishing it.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"4: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://www.contentstack.com/docs/content-managers/working-with-assets/unpublish-an-asset/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Unpublishing an asset\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". You can remove an asset from your web/mobile property by unpublishing it.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"5: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://www.contentstack.com/docs/content-managers/publish-content/view-publish-status-of-entries-assets-in-publish-queue/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Viewing the publish status of entries/assets in the publish queue\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". You can view the details of the entries/assets sent for publishing.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
